result.name: 2009-2010-north-east-irish-sea-razor-clam-survey-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
A fishing vessel was chartered to carry out a survey of razor clam (*Ensis 
siliqua*) populations on the Cumbrian coast, aiming to establish whether a 
commercially viable stock of razor clam existed in this area.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: 2009-2010 North-East Irish Sea Razor Clam Survey - Fisheries Science Partnership

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: Binary download, CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
